short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ice Snow Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Ice Snow background. Ice Snow wallpaper background theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically rotate Ice Snow wallpapers with each new tab.
2. Choose a random or favorite Ice Snow background in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to email and social media platforms.
5. Displays the current date and time.
6. Note feature to jot down reminders and tasks.
7. Quick links to frequently visited websites.
8. Simplified access to bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel to add and access favorite websites quickly.
10. Direct access to Google applications.
11. Explore more themes with ease.
12. Share content directly to social media.
13. Download wallpapers quickly.
14. Instant access to games.
15. Activate seasonal animations like snow, rain, leaves, and fireworks on the Ice Snow new tab page.
